name: One Piece
author: Eiichiro Oda
description: A story about pirates seeking the legendary treasure One Piece.

name: Naruto
author: Masashi Kishimoto
description: The journey of a young ninja aspiring to become Hokage.

name: Attack on Titan
author: Hajime Isayama
description: Humanity's struggle against giant humanoid Titans.

name: Death Note
author: Tsugumi Ohba
description: A high school student discovers a notebook that can kill anyone.

name: My Hero Academia
author: Kohei Horikoshi
description: A world where people have superpowers called Quirks.

name: Tokyo Ghoul
author: Sui Ishida
description: A college student becomes a half-ghoul after a deadly encounter.

name: Demon Slayer
author: Koyoharu Gotouge
description: A boy becomes a demon slayer to avenge his family and save his sister.

name: Fullmetal Alchemist
author: Hiromu Arakawa
description: Two brothers use alchemy in search of the Philosopher's Stone.

name: Bleach
author: Tite Kubo
description: A teenager becomes a Soul Reaper to protect the living from evil spirits.

name: Jujutsu Kaisen
author: Gege Akutami
description: A high school student fights curses after swallowing a cursed object.

name: Chainsaw Man
author: Tatsuki Fujimoto
description: A young man becomes a devil hunter with a chainsaw demon inside him.
